sensors.widgets

Class Thermometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sensors.widgets.Thermometer

  • public class Thermometer
extends java.lang.Object
    A Generic Super class for any thermometer. The Thermometer class is the model for the graphical view.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Thermometer

        public Thermometer()
        Default Class constructor. Assumes Celsius

      • Thermometer

        public Thermometer(java.lang.String scale)
        Class Constructor
        Parameters:
        scale - A string indicating whether Celsius("C"), or Fahrenheit("F") should be used. Also assumes a temperature range of 03 to 120 degrees Celsius.

      • Thermometer

        public Thermometer(java.lang.String scale,
           double lower,
           double upper)
        Class Constructor
        Parameters:
        scale - A string indicating whether Celsius("C"), or Fahrenheit("F") should be used.
        lower - lower temperature range
        upper - upper temperature range

    • Method Detail

      • checkMaxMin

        private void checkMaxMin(double tempC)
        Utility to track max and min temperatures seen over the life of the widget.
        Parameters:
        tempC - the current temperature, in Celsius

        public double getMax()
        Returns:
        The highest temperature seen so far

      • getMin

        public double getMin()
        Returns:
        The lowest temperature seen so far

      • getRange

        public double getRange()
        Returns:
        The maximum temperature "spread". Useful for mapping to pixles.

      • getScale

        public java.lang.String getScale()
        Returns:
        "C" or "F" to indicate the temperature scale being used.

      • getUpper

        public double getUpper()
        Returns:
        upper display range

      • setCelsiusTemp

        public void setCelsiusTemp(double newTemp)
        Parameters:
        newTemp - Sets the current temperature in Celsius, and Fahrenheit, based on the Celsius value passed in.

      • setFahrenheitTemp
